title: Visual Update to Store rolledback, now I can't buy RP?
body: So, since the store was rolledback to what it used to be, nothing appears when I click "purchase RP?" All I get is just a black box. No pop up, no nothing. Several restarts later and still the same thing.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try the following for me.

* [Repair your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6).
* [Enable TLS 1.0 and SSL 3.0](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753044-Store-Error-Store-appears-blank-black-or-empty).
I repaired the client. Now I just get Session Expired. I cannot do the second one as I am running the Mac client.
Take a look at [this support article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660-Issues-with-the-League-of-Legends-Store-PvP-Net-#section-mac) and run through the fixes outlined.

Nothing has helped unfortunately :(. Just tried to open the Purchase RP dialogue on two other computers (both Windows; neither had League updated for a couple patches so weren't logged into whilst we had the new store) and they just give me a blank black window too. So I don't know if it's a problem with my account?
That's pretty odd, could you [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support for me, they'll be able to assist you better.
